usefulItems: square baking pan (8 in. x 8 in.), parchment paper, aluminum foil, airtight container, refrigerator
title: Quick Chocolate Almond Fudge

preparations.content: Line a square baking pan (8 in. x 8 in.) with parchment and set aside.
Place chocolate and condensed milk into mixing bowl and melt <b>4 min/120°F/speed 3<b>.

Transfer to prepared baking pan and press mixture firmly and evenly into the bottom. Cover with foil and refrigerate for 2 hours or until set. Cut into squares (approx. 1½ in.). Store in an airtight container until ready to serve.

hintsAndTricks: Replace almonds with dried fruits or other nuts. Chop large nuts and dried fruit into smaller pieces before adding to chocolate.
Omit nuts for a plain chocolate fudge.
